Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe would be an excellent addition to your collection. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $750000. This is a unique opportunity to secure this high-quality item at a competitive rate. I look forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
